LLBN.SW.summary: Liechtensteinische Landesbank Aktiengesellschaft provides banking products and services in Liechtenstein, Switzerland, Austria, Germany, Central and Eastern Europe, the Middle East, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Retail & Corporate Banking, Private Banking, and Institutional Clients. The company accepts various deposits, including savings, private, current, and custody accounts, as well as time deposits. Its loan products comprise mortgages, Lombard loans, advances, business loans, real estate financing, and guarantees and sureties. The company also offers cards; securities safe custody, investment counselling, investment advice, asset management, and asset structuring services; and financial and retirement planning, and brokering fiduciary investment services. In addition, it provides money market and interbank services; securities trading services; and payment, foreign exchange transaction, and online and mobile banking services. The company operates through 3 branches and 23 ATM locations in Liechtenstein; and 20 branches and 28 ATM locations in the Swiss cantons of Zurich, St. Gallen, Schwyz, and Thurgau. Liechtensteinische Landesbank Aktiengesellschaft was founded in 1861 and is headquartered in Vaduz, Liechtenstein.

VPBN.SW.summary: VP Bank AG, together with its subsidiaries, provides asset-management and investment-advisory services for private and institutional investors, and financial intermediaries in Liechtenstein, Switzerland, rest of Europe, and internationally. The company also offers financing and wealth planning services; personal, foreign currency, and savings accounts; bank cards for card payments and cash withdrawals; e-banking and e-post; and transaction slips, account statements, and interest statements, as well as act as a custodian bank and fund manager. It also provides Lombard loan, such as fixed advance / fixed interest loan and current account overdraft; and property financing services, which include fixed-rate mortgage, forward fixed-rate mortgage, money market mortgage, variable mortgage, and construction loan, as well as services related to trustees and lawyers. VP Bank AG was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Vaduz, Liechtenstein.
